reviewText:
This platformer is quite punishing despite its simple controls and art.

It's a twist from other platformers as you can access a shop anytime to buy and sell time and also spending your crystals on health and several other buffs like bee pets which can loot the crystals and kill the monsters for you. I highly recommend the bees because they help you focus on the level and can save you time which means more crystals.

There is an RNG box which you can try your luck" or kill yourself if you get a bad roll. Poison spikes will inflict a poison debuff which will result in death as well. Checkpoints grant you additional time. You have to learn the map in order to achieve and complete the level.

Not sure if intended or bug?; but jumping onto an enemy who is also jumping in the air will result in loss of life. This would mean that there is some strategy involved as you need to time your jumps.

7/10"

reviewText: I'm not a big fan of side scrolling platforms games but this game brought back memories of my NES good times. I recommend it for its challenge. And also, i think your kids would enjoy it, just like mine did. =D
